ValidationRule.description: If Meeting Connection Method = PSTN Dial In, then additional detail needed
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator", NOT(ISCHANGED(IsUpdateFromCaseComment__c)), ISPICKVAL( Meeting_Connection_Method__c , 'Dial In'), ( ISBLANK ( User_s_Number_Dialed_From__c ) || ISBLANK ( Conference_Number_Dialed__c ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must provide the User's Number Dialed From & Conference Number Dialed.
